short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your daily motivations, techies, lifestyle we got you covered. Specially curated for happiness.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension would generate and display motivational quotes based on well being. Whenever user want to find a random motivational quote they can simply click on the extension and get new quotes every time.
